name: Left-side Trouble
description:
Left-side Trouble : When a 'ghost' occupy the seat on your left side

Music by : en.maoudamashii.com

This demo is the chapter 1 of the story. It's a light and short story about a daily life of a highschooler and her 'unusual' seatmate

Hinomiya Saki is an ordinary high school girl and still don't have any friends. Until a 'ghost' suddenly appears on her left seat and keep bothering her.

Criticism and suggestion is appreciated so i can do better in the future ^^
